title: Sentiment-Based Review Logger
description: This is an AI-powered sentiment analysis system designed to classify user-submitted reviews and log negative feedback for further analysis.

title: Thoracic Disease Model Performance Review
description: Developed an advanced machine learning model to detect fraudulent activities in petroleum plants, achieving 90% detection accuracy. Implemented comprehensive feature engineering and data cleaning processes.

title: Stocknest - Inventory Management System
description: Developed a one page inventory management system for small businesses to track stock levels, orders, and deliveries in real-time.

title: Animator Trigger System
description: Developed a dynamic way of triggering animations in Unity using C# scripts, allowing for more dynamic and responsive character movements in games.

title: Echo Light
description: Developed and successfully deployed a demo version of a game. Echo Light is a 2D top-down exploration game where players navigate through a dark environment using scarce light to reveal their surroundings.
